title: Malzahar Boss Battle visual bug
body:
If anyone knows the solution, tell me in the comments.

Skin bug: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1kiJknwccRk&feature=youtu.be
Skin without bug: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SO5WT9MSavI

replies.body:
Hi hi! 
Thanks for the report! We have a fix going out for this in 8.8. :)
